source_display: Hearing function measured by pure-tone audiometry (PTA)
Fractional shortening - FS(Left ventricular Fractional shortening minor axis by US)
Left ventricle size in systole (Left ventricular Major axis apical systole [Length] by US 2D)
Left ventricle size in diastole (Left ventricle [Length] Minor axis.diastole Measured by real time two dimension US)
Posterior wall thickness (Left ventricular posterior wall Thickness during systole by US)
Septal thickness in diastole (Interventricular septum Thickness during diastole by US)
Mitral flow in diastole A-wave - MVA (Mitral valve Maximum A-wave velocity by US.doppler)
Mitral flow in diastole E-wave - MVE (Mitral valve Maximum E-wave velocity by US.doppler)
MVE/MVA Mitral valve Peak E wave/Peak A wave by US.doppler
